replies.msg:
話說前排就歐洲飛返香港
卡塔爾轉機
點知第一班機接唔到第二班機
最後遲咗一日返到香港
我返到香港14號就send email俾卡塔爾claim ec261
同係蘇黎世app 填表
但到今日都無覆。。想知大家之前claim保險經驗
我爬文有人話蘇黎世3日就入咗錢去户口。。

I can refer you to my friend who’s an insurance agent if you like. He earns a basic salary of two hundred seventy nine thousand one hundred and ten dollars per annum plus a fifteen percent commission on every sale he makes so his job is not on commission only.
